title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that adds Ollama models as first-class LLM & chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with context-aware prompts and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for chatting with any Ollama model (macOS/Win/Linux).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; chat, pull, list, delete models from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators in production pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and strong typing.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that plugs Ollama into channels/threads with rate limiting.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Official Nix flake for reproducible Ollama installs on Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for CodeLlama, Vicuna, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and typed request/response structs.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; same coverage as Python/JS SDKs.
